subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With the inclusion of teams like Iona, Colorado State and Brigham Young, one could argue that the N.C.A.A. tournament selection committee is becoming more open-minded about lower-profile leagues.
snippet: With the inclusion of teams like Iona, Colorado State and Brigham Young, one could argue that the N.C.A.A. tournament selection committee is becoming more open-minded about lower-profile leagues.
